answers.answer: Hey I say one of your post and I have pregnancy diabetes too how is it going for you I'm only 22 weeks

My best friend, she went for a check up and she had no fluid left. They had to induce right away. But the baby has heart issues. They don't know how long her water had been gone for. It's scary. I hope she's ok and her baby is doing well!!!!

Its going okay my sugars stay down with walking. I don't do the diet as stricked because with working out my sugars are normal. I did cut out all sweets and that helped a lot. I drink nothing but water and I might have a lil milk every now and again.
@mommyof she is doing fine as far as I know.
It's happened to me. I was measuring small went for an ultrasound to find out I had no fluid. If you leak it's hard to know for sure if it's fluid or urine. I was induced that day.
I haven't noticed any leaking. I went to L&D and they checked and said everything was fine and I still had fluid. That was the week before last I think.

question: My husband's friend just had her baby (2 weeks early) well she went to her check up and found out her water had broke. She said she never new it broke.  Has this happened to anyone?
title: has this happened to anyone else?
